doc: Used to customize the appearance of a . Note that setting the toolbar style overrides the user’s preferences for the default toolbar style. Note that if the button has only a label set and GTK_TOOLBAR_ICONS is used, the label will be visible, and vice versa.

members.doc: Buttons display only icons in the toolbar.
members.name: icons

members.doc: Buttons display only text labels in the toolbar.
members.name: text

members.doc: Buttons display text and icons in the toolbar.
members.name: both

members.doc: Buttons display icons and text alongside each other, rather than vertically stacked
members.name: both_horiz

name: ToolbarStyle
